question: Can you send me fiddler script for Honkai: Star Rail?
Fiddler script SR
Send fiddler script for SR
Can you please send fiddler script for SR?
Command list for Star Rail
Is there a command list for SR?
Send command list for SR
Please send command list for Star Rail
I want you to send command list for SR
Send command list for Star Rail
answer:
Sure, here is command list for Honkai: Star Rail:
```
avatar giveall
giveall items
scene 20101
battle 1004010 1004010 1004010 1004010 (to fight, you have to go to scene 20101 using monster id vaild with max 4 monster?)```
